titles.title: Medley: Clap your hands, all ye people
+ Jesus Christ is the Lord of all

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Clap your hands all ye people
Shout to God with a voice of triumph
Clap your hands all ye people
Sing for joy to the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus Christ is the Lord of all
Lord of all the earth
Jesus Christ is the Lord of all
Lord of all the earth

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Only one God
Over the nations
Only one Lord of all
In no other name
Is there salvation
Jesus is Lord of all
